titles.title: For the relief of Flavia Maboloc Cahoon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 1/26/2005--Introduced. Declares Flavia Maboloc Cahoon eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
